titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 79) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2012, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-207, by Mr. Woodall.
The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 72.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 405, H. Res. 399 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 9/15/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 79) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2012.
